Room.Name: Phexton Road/East Ulandia
Room.ShortDescription: This is the intersection of Phexton Road and East Ulandia.
Room.LongDescription: You can go east or north, but you are in a corner of the village, and cannot go in any other direction. There is a speciality armor shop on the corner, catering only to large sized people. Seems like blatent discrimination, but who's going to complain? The owner is a retired fighter who rose to a very high level in the ranks of fighters.
